statements: UPDATE customer_interactions SET interaction_type='Email', interaction_date='2022-05-10', interaction_details='Sent follow-up email' WHERE customer_id=101;
UPDATE customer_interactions SET interaction_date='2022-05-12', interaction_details='Phone call to discuss feedback', interaction_type='Phone' WHERE customer_id=202;
UPDATE customer_interactions SET interaction_date = '2022-03-15', interaction_details = 'Met with customer to discuss new project' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE customer_interactions SET interaction_type = 'Phone Call', customer_id = 5, interaction_date = '2022-03-01' WHERE id = 3
UPDATE customers SET name='Alice', email='alice@example.com' WHERE customer_id=1;
UPDATE interactions SET interaction_type='email', details='Sent email to customer' WHERE customer_id=2;
UPDATE customers SET name = 'John Doe', phone_number = '123-456-7890' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE interactions SET interaction_type = 'Email', details = 'Sent follow-up email' WHERE interaction_id = 5;
UPDATE customers SET customer_name = 'John Doe' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE support_tickets SET issue_description = 'Resolved' WHERE ticket_id = 3;
UPDATE customers SET customer_name = 'John Doe', customer_email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 123;
UPDATE purchases SET total_amount = 1000.50 WHERE purchase_id = 456;
UPDATE customers SET phone_number = '+1234567890' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE purchases SET product_name = 'New Product' WHERE purchase_id = 5;
UPDATE customers SET email='new_email@example.com', phone_number='123-456-7890' WHERE customer_id=100;
UPDATE support_tickets SET issue_description='Resolved the issue successfully', support_date='2022-01-15 09:30:00' WHERE ticket_id=500;
UPDATE purchases SET total_amount = 100.50 WHERE purchase_id = 12345;
UPDATE customer_feedback SET feedback_text = 'Great service! Thank you.' WHERE customer_id = 54321;
UPDATE purchases SET total_amount = 1200 WHERE customer_id = 101 AND purchase_date = '2022-01-15';
UPDATE customer_profile SET phone_number = '+1234567890', email = 'example@email.com' WHERE customer_id = 102;
